title: Large Pothole on Main Street
description: Located near the intersection with Oak Avenue, causing traffic delays and vehicle damage.

title: Flickering Street Light
description: Street light on Elm Street has been flickering intermittently, affecting visibility at night.

title: Blocked Storm Drain
description: Storm drain was completely blocked, causing water to pool on the road during rain.

title: Damaged Speed Limit Sign
description: Speed limit sign is bent and partially obscured, making it difficult to read.

title: Cracked Road Surface
description: Large cracks have appeared on the road surface, creating a bumpy ride for vehicles.

title: Malfunctioning Traffic Signal
description: Traffic signal was stuck on red, causing major traffic congestion during rush hour.

title: Uneven Sidewalk
description: Sidewalk has become uneven due to tree root growth, creating a tripping hazard.

title: Multiple Small Potholes
description: Several small potholes have formed in the residential area, affecting local traffic.

title: Overflowing Drain
description: Drain was overflowing during heavy rain, causing minor flooding on the street.

title: Sunken Road at Market Corner
description: Section of road has sunk after recent rains; vehicles scrape underneath.

title: Broken Speed Camera
description: Automated speed camera is damaged and not recording violations.

title: Streetlight Out on Coastal Road
description: Several streetlights are out along the coastal stretch, reducing night visibility.

title: Collapsed Kerb Near School
description: Kerb has collapsed creating a hazard for pedestrians and school children.

title: Faded Road Markings on Highway
description: Lane markings have faded significantly on a busy highway stretch.

title: Damaged Pedestrian Signal
description: Pedestrian crossing signal is not functioning at busy junction.

title: Pothole Cluster Near Bus Stop
description: Several potholes by the bus stop causing boarding difficulties.

title: Temporary Flooding at Underpass
description: Underpass floods during heavy rains; water remains for hours.

title: Signboard Missing on Bypass
description: Directional signboard was removed, causing confusion for drivers.

title: Traffic Light Timing Issue
description: Signal timings are causing long queues during peak hours.

title: Loose Manhole Cover
description: Manhole cover is loose and rattles when vehicles pass over it.

title: Graffiti on Highway Sign
description: Important directional sign is covered by graffiti, reducing readability.

title: Obstructed Drain Grate
description: Leaves and debris blocking drain grate causing slow drainage.

title: Cracked Footpath Outside Mall
description: Footpath slabs cracked and uneven outside the shopping mall entrance.

title: Night-time Visibility Issue
description: Reflective road studs are missing on a sharp bend, increasing accident risk.

title: Bus Shelter Roof Damage
description: Bus shelter roof has holes and needs repair to protect waiting passengers.

title: Illegal Dumping at Roadside
description: Household waste dumped alongside road leading to blockage and pests.

title: Road Shoulder Erosion
description: Road shoulder eroded after a landslip, creating a narrow carriageway.

title: Signal Visibility Obstructed by Tree
description: Overgrown tree branches block the view of traffic signals at junction.

title: Sidewalk Obstructed by Vendor Stalls
description: Vendors occupying sidewalks forcing pedestrians onto the road.
